name: Caplan et ux., v. Kent, Appellant, et al.

judges: Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Jones, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
parties: Caplan et ux., v. Kent, Appellant, et al.

opinions.text:
Opinion
phr Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Adams. Costs of this appeal to be paid by the appellant.
opinions.author: phr Curiam,

attorneys: William 8. Doty, with him Horton Smith, for appellant.
Richard B. Tucker, Jr. with him Patterson, Crawford, Arensberg & Dunn, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Caplan et ux., v. Kent, Appellant, et al.
Argued October 9, 1950.
Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Jones, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
William 8. Doty, with him Horton Smith, for appellant.
Richard B. Tucker, Jr. with him Patterson, Crawford, Arensberg & Dunn, for appellees.
November 27, 1950:
